executable.title: SH Coefficients of DWI Signal in DTI With Symmetric Tensor
executable.description:
Compute SH coefficients of DWI signal in DTI with symmetric tensor (along z-axis). 
\ Examples: 
\ ComputeSHCoefficientsOfDWIFromSymmetricTensor --sh 4 --bvalues 1000 --famd 0.9,0.7e-3 
\ ComputeSHCoefficientsOfDWIFromSymmetricTensor --sh 4 --bvalues 1000 --famd 0.9,0.7e-3 --nob 
\ ComputeSHCoefficientsOfDWIFromSymmetricTensor --sh 4 --bvalues 1000 --eigenvalues 1.7e-3,0.3e-3

string.name: _OutputFile
string.label: output file
string.description: Output SH coefficients into the file. If not set, output to screen.

float-vector.name: _FAMD
float-vector.label: Tensor FA and MD
float-vector.description: FA and Mean Diffusivity (MD) for symmetric tensor.

boolean.name: _OutputAllCoefficients
boolean.description: If it is set, output all coefficients including zeros for c_{l,m}, m!=0. If not set, output only c_{l,0}

boolean.name: _NoB
boolean.description: If it is set, only print SH coefficients without b values.
